title: Emerald Peacock Jhumkaalu - A Timeless Classic
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold. Adorned with shimmering Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones and a single Emerald cabochon at the top of each earring. Features a fine 'Hyderabadi Polish' for a lasting luster.
features: These exquisite Jhumka earrings feature a delicate peacock (Mayura) design above the classic bell-shaped (ghungroo) Jhumka. The intricate filigree work within the jhumka is meticulously hand-crafted, creating a captivating play of light. The peacock design is a symbol of beauty and grace, adding a touch of traditional elegance.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling white (CZ stones) and a vibrant green emerald at the apex. The warm gold complements the cool green for a classic South Indian color palette.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (Vivahalu)
and family celebrations. Also suitable for contemporary events where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance.
description: These Jhumkaalu represent the epitome of South Indian craftsmanship. The fine detailing and traditional design elements make it a timeless piece. The high-quality CZ stones provide a brilliant sparkle, while the gold ensures durability and lasting value. A symbol of heritage and elegance, these earrings are sure to make a statement.
